content_cards.title: Product Description
content_cards.data: Premium Smooth-Flow gel pen featuring advanced smooth gel ink technology. Quick-dry formula prevents smudging. Ergonomic rubber grip ensures comfortable writing for extended periods. Available in 4 vibrant colors (Blue, Black, Red, Green) and 3 tip sizes (0.5mm, 0.7mm, 1.0mm) to suit different writing preferences. Refillable design for long-term value. Perfect for students, professionals, and everyday writing.

subtitle: Comfort grip · Smudge-free writing · Multiple colors & sizes
title: Smooth-Flow Gel Pen – Multi-color
